name: Asylum of the Dead
description:
In 1992, there were rumors about this abandoned asylum that the patients dead there were bring back to life. You were a formal special agent of the government that somehow got in to the asylum by accident. Your goal is to investigate the asylum and clear the asylum by any means necessary.

Asylum of the Dead is a first person shooting survival game where the player needs to find weapons and ammo to protect yourself and get out of the asylum.

features

  • Multiple weapons including shotgun, rifles, pistol and melee weapons
  • Several health/stamina boosts that can help you in needs.
  • Feel the fear of the asylum, cuz there will be jump scares.
